Uses of Interface
geometry.planar.Area

  • Packages that use Area 
    Package Description
    board
    Contains classes describing items on a printed circuit board and the board itself.
    boardgraphics
    Contains user interface independent functionality for displaying a board on a sccreen.
    designformats.specctra
    Contains classes for reading and writing board designs in the Specctra dsn text format.
    geometry.planar
    Contains general purpose 2-dimensional geometry classes.
    library
    Describes library objects of a printed circuit board such as padstacks and component packages.

    • Uses of Area in geometry.planar

      Subinterfaces of Area in geometry.planar 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ConvexShape
      A shape is defined as convex, if for each line segment with both endpoints contained in the shape the whole segment is contained completely in the shape.
      interface  Shape
      Interface describing functionality for connected 2-dimensional shapes in the plane.
      Classes in geometry.planar that implement Area 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Circle
      Discribes functionality of a circle shape in the plane.
      class  IntBox
      Implements functionality of orthogonal rectangles in the plane with integer coordinates.
      class  IntOctagon
      Implements functionality for convex shapes, whose borderline directions are multiples of 45 degree and defined with integer coordinates.
      class  PolygonShape
      Shape described bei a closed polygon of corner points.
      class  PolylineArea
      A PolylineArea is an Area, where the outside border curve and the hole borders consist of straight lines.
      class  PolylineShape
      Abstract class with functions for shapes, whose borders consist ob straight lines.
      class  RegularTileShape
      TileShapes whose border lines may have only directions out of a fixed set, as for example orthoganal directions, which define axis parallel box shapes.
      class  Simplex
      Convex shape defined as intersection of half-planes.
      class  TileShape
      Abstract class defining functionality for convex shapes, whose borders consists of straight lines.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Rotates the area around p_pole by p_angle.

      Returns the affine translation of the area by p_vector
      Area Area.turn_90_degree(int p_factor, IntPoint p_pole)
      Turns this area by p_factor times 90 degree around p_pole.
